forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High near 65F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 61F. SW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 58F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 14C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 57F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 14C. SW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 58F. SW winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 63F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
